title: Highly Skilled Carpenter
comment: Bob is an excellent carpenter. He did a fantastic job.

title: Great Landscaping Work
comment: Alice did a wonderful job landscaping my garden.

title: Average Plumber
comment: Bob's plumbing work was okay but could have been better.

title: Exceptional Tiler
comment: Alice is a highly skilled tiler. The bathroom looks amazing.

title: Good Electrical Work
comment: Carol did a great job with the electrical installation.
